Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes the mobile and manufactured home replacement program
Summary: Establishes the mobile and manufactured home replacement program to eliminate older mobile and manufactured homes and replace them with new manufactured, modular or site-built homes; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add Art 27-A §§1240 - 1242, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to the mobile and manufactured home replacement program
